Text.Language: Pekp~neuma eyouab P[oic v/e~takouorpf e~jen neka~gioc m~may/t/c: ouoh n~a~poctoloc ettai/out: qen ]ajp som]: vai m~perolf e~bol haron w~ pia~gayoc alla a~ritf m~beri qen n/etcaqoun m~mon.
Your Holy Spirit, O Lord whom You sent forth upon Your holy disciples and honored apostles in the third hour, do not take away from us, O Good One, but renew Him within us.
